item.title: By: ann viera
item.dc:creator: ann viera
item.description: Thank you! Could the CC BY logo and attribution be put directly on the infographic, or is it already there and I don't see it? I'd like to use it for OA week.
item.content:encoded: Thank you! Could the CC BY logo and attribution be put directly on the infographic, or is it already there and I don’t see it? I’d like to use it for OA week.

item.title: By: Jason Colditz
item.dc:creator: Jason Colditz
item.description: Nice work, Jon! Much more visually appealing than my old 2012 flowchart on OA. We've come a long way! https://figshare.com/articles/OA_Dissemination_Paths/91458
item.content:encoded:
Nice work, Jon! Much more visually appealing than my old 2012 flowchart on OA. We’ve come a long way!
